prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a soft gray color and big ears.
I want a cute Pokemon with fluffy features and a mysterious aura.
Generate an adorable creature with purple eyes and a round body shape.
Make a small, psychic Pokemon that looks like it could be a pet.
Imagine a Pokemon with gentle features, perfect for a calming forest setting.
Design a character that embodies cuteness, with a distinctively round face.
Show me a tiny, fluffy Pokemon that loves to hide in urban areas.
